name: Ôperêó
description:
A open world game that is in development has some bugs and it dont have good grapics yet.

-- IN THE SHOP--

bullets cost: 1 gives 1 bullet.

syringes cost 100 and gives full healt.

bandages cost 10 and heal 5.

bullet upgarde make the bullets more deadly by 1.

So if the enemy dont die go away from it then go close to it.

The game has allot of bugs so report them!

-- Controls--

WASD to walk

P to use syringes

O to use bandages
